title: kAmAkSi nAtO
sahitya:
kAmAkSi nAtO vAdA dayalEdA kAmAkSi nannokani brOcuTa bhAramA bangAru


anupallavi

  tAmasamu jEsitE nE tALanammA nI nAma pArAyaNamu vina vEDitinammA mAyammA


caraNam    shyAmakrSNa sOdarI tallI (ambA) shuka shyAmaLE ninnE kOriyunnAnammA mAyammanni nE dalaci dalaci mATimATiki kannIru viDuva lEdA ambA nIvu mATADakuNDina nE tALalEnammA nI biDDanu lAlincavE 
doDDatallivE kAmAdula capala citta pAmaruDai tirigi tirigi ilalO kAmita kathalu vini vini vEsAri nEnu EmAr pOtunA
